summary: CONSUMER STATES GMC "IGNITION SWITCH FIX" WORKED IN REVERSE. *TA  THE CONSUMER STATED HE DID NOT HAVE ANY PROBLEMS WITH VEHICLE, UNTIL HE TOOK THE VEHICLE TO THE DEALER TO HAVE THE RECALL PERFORMED. AS HE WAS DRIVING HOME, THE DASH LIGHTS AND WARNING LIGHTS ILLUMINATED ON THE DASHBOARD, AND KEPT FLASHING, AFTER THE ENGINE WAS TURNED OFF.  THE LIGHTS STOPPED FLASHING, AFTER HE PUT THE KEY BACK IN THE IGNITION AND TURNED THE VEHICLE ON.  ON A SEPARATE OCCASION, THE AIR CONDITION STOPPED WORKING, THE GAUGES WENT TO ZERO AND THE DASH LIGHTS CONTINUED TO FLASH. *JB
